titlestmt.titleproper: University Towers Investment Club; Records ua814

publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-28 19:04:59 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: The collection includes the records of the University Towers Investment Club ranging from 1965 to 1991. The records detail the club's the investment activities, politics, and the financial status of the club.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection was maintained in the original order after it was transferred.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The University Towers Investment Club was a faculty club founded in 1962. The club's purpose was to pool member's money together to make greater investments in the stock market. The club was limited to about 15 members when it was first was founded and steadily grew overtime. Club membership was restrictive and potential members had to apply to become a member. Meetings were held once a month to discuss the club's investments. Membership increased even greater when the club was merged with the Albany Towers Investing Club in 1973.The club amassed an investment portfolio of about 35,000 dollars, by investing in companies such as, Disney, AT&T, Pan American World Airways, and John Deere.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, University Towers Investment Club Records, 1965-1991. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The collection was refoldered and put into acid free boxes. During processing listing of social scecurtiy numbers were removed

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Accessioned along with Provost and Graduate Studies materials. The collection contains records from the University Towers Investment Club. Records include documents such as memos, investment portfolios, meeting notifications, meeting records, correspondence between club leaders and members, financial records of the club, and tax statements.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Discovered as part of Provost and Graduate Studies materials in 2016 and moved to separate collection. Sorrell Chesin has arranged the transfer of materials in the past, so it is possible that he was responsible for these records as well.
